title: ss3grid

SSgrid is an developing R package that facilitates [Stock Synthesis](https://github.com/nmfs-stock-synthesis/stock-synthesis) models on the [Open Science Grid's](https://osg-htc.org/) [HTCondor](https://htcondor.org/) network.
